Title: GoVA
Description:
This project provids tools & environment which manage match game of something and also showing/measuring real-time race status, tracking race results and so on.
This tools & environment will be developed using WCF, WPF, SQL Server, MSRS and some Windows Embedded Technologies.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project provids tools & environment which manage match game of something and also showing/measuring real-time race status, tracking race results and so on.
This tools & environment will be developed using WCF, WPF, SQL Server, MSRS and some Windows Embedded Technologies.


"GoVA" is shorthand of "Game Organizer, Viewer and Administrator"
